title: Authentic chickpea curry
ingredients: ['2 (400g) tins chickpeas', '1 tablespoon bicarbonate of soda', 'oil for frying', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon garlic and ginger paste', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon turmeric', '1/2 teaspoon garam masala', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '2 blocks frozen chopped spinach']
